p.k: Cluckwork Orange After befriending a chicken with a bad attitude at a petting zoo Jude is followed back to school by the chicken. He defends the bad bird's behavior until he can defend it no longer.
p.d: Go back to see how the drama started! Watch pint-sized versions of your favorite Total Drama characters find adventure in the daycare center. They may be toddlers but Duncan Leshawna Owen Beth Noah Izzy Jude Cody Bridgette Gwen and Courtney are more outrageous than ever. Can Chef keep these crazy kids under control?
